original_solution_mapping.L1: Working together, they can decorate 24 + 10 = <<24+10=34>>34 eggs per hour.
original_solution_mapping.L2: It will take them 170 / 34 = <<170/34=5>>5 hours to decorate all of the eggs.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 6069.
    Returns: the time it will take to decorate all the eggs.
    """
    # L1
    mia_eggs_per_hour = 24 # 2 dozen Easter eggs per hour (2 * 12)
    billy_eggs_per_hour = 10 # 10 eggs per hour
    combined_eggs_per_hour = mia_eggs_per_hour + billy_eggs_per_hour

    # L2
    total_eggs_needed = 170 # 170 eggs for the Easter egg hunt
    time_to_decorate = total_eggs_needed / combined_eggs_per_hour

    # FA
    answer = time_to_decorate
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Working together, they can decorate {mia_eggs_per_hour} + {billy_eggs_per_hour} = <<{mia_eggs_per_hour}+{billy_eggs_per_hour}={combined_eggs_per_hour}>>{combined_eggs_per_hour} eggs per hour.
It will take them {total_eggs_needed} / {combined_eggs_per_hour} = <<{total_eggs_needed}/{combined_eggs_per_hour}={time_to_decorate}>>{time_to_decorate} hours to decorate all of the eggs.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Working together, they can decorate 24 + 10 = <<24+10=34>>34 eggs per hour.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: It will take them 170 / 170 = <<170/170=1>>1 hours to decorate all of the eggs.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'total_eggs_needed' (value: 170) was used instead of 'combined_eggs_per_hour' (value: 34).
